ZoomTo example

Click on the button in the toolbar. Input valid coordinates in the text fields then click on the "zoom" button. The map gets automatically recentered on the place inputed.

See ZoomToExample.js for the source code.

Chicoutimi (EPSG:42304), X: 1731386.25 Y: 263787.0625

To demonstrate that the widget supports i18n, fr.js was loaded.

In order to be able to reproject in other projections than EPSG:4326 and EPSG:900913, proj4js is required.
